item.content:encoded:
However you hangout with someone, their friendship is reset to zero the following day.

Actually, that's no longer true. You only lose friend points if you hang out via friend points or Floating on Air. McM stated it a while back.

item.title: Re: hanging out status
item.content:encoded:
There are two ways. You can hangout via Friendship or you can hangout some other way.

Your allies accumulate Friendship when you use them on missions. There are Themes, items and even jutsu you can use to increase the rate of Friendship gain. You can also throw parties to increase Friendship. To hangout via Friendship you must have 1000 or more Friendship with the ally and be in the top 10 friendship rankings at dayroll, which is when hangout status is checked for.

The other way to hangout is via using some item that gives you instant hangout status without the hassle of grinding Friendship. This includes Stuffed Walruses (Season 3+) Make Out Mood Enhancers (which can be bought from the Arena or traded for from a Season 2+ player), and Floating on Air (which is one of the very few themes available to Season 1 players).

However you hangout with someone, their friendship is reset to zero the following day.
